name: Coal The Pleated Face Mask 3 Pack - Unisex
description: Protect yourself and others while in crowded spaces or while social distancing. These double-layer masks fully cover your nose, mouth and chin to help prevent the spread of droplets. The washable design keeps them fresh.2 layers of tightly woven cotton fabric meet CDC requirements.Nose stiffener and elastic ear loops hold mask in place.Pleats expand for a custom fit.Small fits youth or smaller adults. Medium fits average adult faces. Large fits fuller adult faces.Hand-washable.Contains 3 masks.
